author: wddgit
body:
#### PR description:

Minor cleanup in IndexIntoFile unit tests. Motivated by a comment in an earlier PR

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/37532#discussion_r862080899

This only affects a unit test, nothing more.

Note the problem was not as large as I originally thought. It only affected two files and only some parts of them. Other parts were already using switch or if else.

#### PR validation:

The modified unit test still passes. Nothing else is affected.
title: Minor cleanup in IndexIntoFile unit tests
